verses.name: Ephesians 5:27
verses.text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.

verses.name: Ephesians 5:28
verses.text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies. He that loveth his wife loveth himself.

verses.name: Ephesians 5:29
verses.text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh; but nourisheth and cherisheth it, even as the Lord the church:

verses.name: Ephesians 5:30
verses.text: For we are members of his body, of his flesh, and of his bones.
